A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Slightly more original than the Force Awakens but still ripping whole scenes from earlier movies. Once again I like the characters/cast but their story is just lacking. It's like Disney doesn't have a plan but they have to start making their 4 billion back\, it's like they want to hit all the notes from the earlier trilogies but they're tone deaf. NOT a horrible move just not great. A solid Meh.
